name: (IO) 1. Speaking - IT Organisations
questionContents: (IT Organisations) What technology company would you choose to discuss?
(IT Organisations) What activities does this company carry out?
(IT Organisations) Why is this company important in the technology sector?

name: (IO) 2. Vocabulary: Company Profiles
questionContents: A company or companies that sell things (Futachiba)
Companies that make things to sell (Futachiba)
Factories (Futachiba)
Things a company sells (Futachiba)
Using software that runs and stores information on the internet (IBGroup)
Customers (IBGroup)
Start selling a new product (Digital World)

name: (IO) 3. Reading: Company Profiles
questionContents: Which company or companies is getting bigger?
Which company or companies develops software?
Which company or companies makes things in more than one country?
Which company or companies has a new product to launch?
Which company or companies sells software for use on the internet?

name: (IO) 4. Speaking: IT Organisations
questionContents: (IT Organisations) Which IT organisation would you prefer to work for?
(IT Organisations) Why would you prefer to work for this organisation?
